Name: Subatomic particle
Description: A microscopically small unit of matter or energy.

Properties.Name: Electric charge
Properties.Description: How much charge the particle carries, in units of elementary charge (so that an electron has charge -1).

Properties.Name: Family
Properties.Description: The family of subatomic particles this particle belongs to

Properties.Name: Generation
Properties.Description: Which subatomic particle generation this particle belongs to (lower generations have lower mass).  There are three generations according to the Standard Model of particle physics.

Properties.Name: Interactions
Properties.Description: What sort of interactions the particle takes part in (what forces affect this particle).

Properties.Name: Magnetic moment
Properties.Description: The magnetic moment of the particle (a measure of the magnitude of its magnetism) and its uncertainty

Properties.Name: Mass
Properties.Description: The invariant mass of the particle (in units of MeV/cÂ²), including its uncertainty
